test-method.name: isEnabledCommentInput
test-method.description: Check if textarea comment input field is enabled.

test-method.name: verifyCommentTyped
test-method.description: Check if the user is able to type in the textarea, and if the entered comment is same what user typed.

test-method.name: isEnabledStarRating
test-method.description: Check if all the star ratings are enabled

test-method.name: verifyTextForRating
test-method.description: Check if terrible is printed for for 1st star rating, bad is printed for 2nd star rating and so on.

test-method.name: verifyPageNavigation
test-method.description: Verify the navigation of menu buttons

test-method.name: verifySendBtnText
test-method.description: Check if "Send Feedback" text is present in the Send Feedback button.

test-method.name: verifyPageTitle
test-method.description: Check if the web page title is same as per requirement.

test-method.name: verifyCustomerServiceNavigation
test-method.description: Check if Customer Page gets opened successfully if user clicks on contact us present in the tooltip message.

test-method.name: validateStatusCode
test-method.description: Check if the status code is 200.

test-method.name: validateContentType
test-method.description: Check if the response content type is in JSON format.

test-method.name: validateFirstName
test-method.description: Check if the respnse have firstName as Aman for empId as 610001.

test-method.name: addNewEmployeeDetails
test-method.description: Add new employee detail and verify it.
